text: Where I'm Coming From is the thirteenth album by Stevie Wonder. The album was released by Motown Records on April 12, 1971. It was his only album to be released in 1971 as Music of My Mind was released in 1972. ==Track listing== All songs written by Stevie Wonder and Syreeta Wright ;Side One # "Look Around" – 2:45 # "Do Yourself a Favor" – 6:10 # "Think of Me as Your Soldier" – 3:37 # "Something Out of the Blue" – 2:59 # "If You Really Love Me" – 3:00 ;Side Two # "I Wanna Talk to You" – 5:18 # "Take Up a Course in Happiness" – 3:11 # "Never Dreamed You'd Leave in Summer" – 2:53 # "Sunshine in Their Eyes" – 6:58 ==References== Category:1971 albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Soul albums Category:Funk albums
title: Where I'm Coming From
